infos.value: Most of our foes have been taken care of. Now, let's finally depart this village.
Mm? A young maiden?
You needn't worry, miss. Your village is safe now.
We'll be out of your hair in no time.
Actually, I wondered... Might I...join you?
Join us!?
Sorry, but I think you'd be safer with other people.
We've got Fennes hot on our tails right now.
I will not be a burden, I swear it. You may call me Minwu.
Hmmm.
Father, no. We mustn't drag any more innocent villagers into our war.
You are headed for Wezette, are you not?
We are.
I could be your guide. I am well versed in the lay of this land.
Why would you go to such lengths to help us?
We almost threw your entire village to the wolves.
I was moved by the way you have chosen to live your life, Lord Mont. That is why...
Who, me!?
Gwahaha. Then join him on his chosen path. Lead the way!
Yes, Your Majesty. Please, do follow me.
F-Father...
